channel.title: Regular expressions on Programming project 2023-24

item.title: Usage
item.description: Usage # String validation # In a sense, regular expressions can be viewed as a (relatively inexpressive) programming language for string validation. Precisely, each regular expression $e$ can be viewed as a program that: takes as input a word $w$, and returns true if $w$ belongs to the language described by $e$, and returns false otherwise. Pattern matching # Another common usage of regexes is pattern matching. In this scenario, each regular expression $e$ can be viewed as a program that:
